## ğŸš¨ Beta Program Ended

This is the **final public beta release** of EasyPy Desktop.

The beta phase has officially ended.  
Starting with version **2.2**, EasyPy Desktop is released as a **Stable Early Access** product.

### ğŸ”½ Where to Download Now

All official downloads are now hosted on Gumroad:

ğŸ‘‰ EasyPy Desktop (Free Download):  
https://emosoft.gumroad.com/l/easypydesktop

ğŸ‘‰ PRO License (Optional, unlocks EXE export):  
https://emosoft.gumroad.com/l/easypydesktoplicense

### â„¹ï¸ Important Notes

- There will be **no further beta or prerelease builds on GitHub**
- GitHub will continue to be used for changelogs and issue tracking
- The same application is used for Free and PRO modes
- Distribution features require a PRO License activated inside the app

Thank you to everyone who participated in the beta and provided feedback â¤ï¸
